verses.roman:
tabe prabhu tāṅra hāta dhari' lañā gelā
piṇḍāra upare āpana-pāśe vasāilā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—of Sanātana Gosvāmī; hāta dhari'-catching the hand; lañā gelā—took him inside; piṇḍāra upare—in an elevated place; āpana-pāśe—near Him; vasāilā—made Sanātana Gosvāmī sit down.
translation: Catching his hand, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took Sanātana Gosvāmī inside and made him sit in an elevated place next to Him.
